channel.description: Recent content in Electric Car on tedn.life

item.title: Range anxiety? What range anxiety! (My first road trip with the BADMobile :))
item.description:
In case you are wondering ... this is the BADMobile ... (ask me, if you want :)) ...
My friend Klaus and myself have spend more time and more miles (on motorbike(s)) together than we care to count. And the pattern is that once in a while we need to do something crazy. This time around we decided that in the next 5 years we will visit all of the major road races in the UK & Ireland (at least) once.
